Uses of Interface
edu.iris.dmc.fdsn.station.model.Filter

    • Uses of Filter in edu.iris.dmc.fdsn.station.model

      Classes in edu.iris.dmc.fdsn.station.model that implement Filter 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BaseFilter
      The BaseFilterType is derived by all filters.
      class  Coefficients
      Response: coefficients for FIR filter.
      class  FIR
      Response: FIR filter.
      class  PolesZeros
      Response: complex poles and zeros.
      class  Polynomial
      Response: expressed as a polynomial (allows non-linear sensors to be described).
      class  ResponseList
      Response: list of frequency, amplitude and phase values.
